text: The data you have provided us with for the purpose of subscribing to the newsletter will be stored by us until you unsubscribe from the newsletter and deleted after you cancel the newsletter.

If you pay us through an invoicing process we collect the following information: Email
If you would like to receive the newsletter offered on the website, we need an email address from you, as well as information that allows us to verify that you are the owner of the email address provided and that you agree to receive the newsletter.
In the event of important changes, such as changes to the scope of the offer or technically necessary changes, we will use the email address provided during registration to inform you in this way.

text:
Privacy Policy

1. Data protection at a glance

Data collection on our website

The information we collect might include:
The information we collect might include: National tax identifier information for other countries

Other data is automatically collected by our IT systems when you visit the website.
These are mainly technical data (e.g. Internet browser, operating system or time of the page call).
If you pay us through an invoicing process we collect the following information: Contact Name

If you object, we will no longer process your personal data concerned unless we can prove that there are compelling reasons for processing which are worthy of protection and which outweigh your interests, rights and freedoms, or unless the processing serves to assert, exercise or defend legal claims (objection according to Art. 21 Para. 1 DSGVO).
We only transfer personal data to third parties if this is necessary within the framework of the contract, for example to the credit institution commissioned with the handling of payments.

collector: credit institution commission with handling of payment
text: We only transfer personal data to third parties if this is necessary within the framework of the contract, for example to the credit institution commissioned with the handling of payments.

For this reason, we collect and use personal data only as it is necessary for us to deliver our product to our clients.
If you contact us by email or telephone, your inquiry including all personal data (name, inquiry) will be stored and processed by us for the purpose of processing your request.
We collect, process and use personal data on the use of our Internet pages (usage data) only to the extent necessary to enable the user to use the service or to invoice the user.
We collect, process and use personal data only to the extent that they are necessary for the establishment, content or modification of the legal relationship (inventory data).
We only transfer personal data to third parties if this is necessary within the framework of the contract, for example to the credit institution commissioned with the handling of payments.
